segments.text: Hello , Jason . Are you free this Saturday evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to Come to our barbecue ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But wait , wait , will there be food that is not meat ? You know . I'm a vegetarian
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ! I didn't know that ! When did you become a vegetarian ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The other day , I decided that I needed to loose more weight so I am going to try to be a vegetarian . And you know what ? I don't miss the taste of meat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it really is . After having vegetarian diet . I have much more energy , I need less sleep , I feel calmer . I can maintain an ideal body weight without worrying about how much I eat and I can think more clearly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding ? I really don't think that you think less clearly on non-vegetarian diet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , maybe . But I feel better since becoming a vegetarian . Maybe you could also have a try .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I'll also have a try some day , but I'm afraid that it would be difficult for me to refuse meat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you would change your mind after having a vegetarian diet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll see . Anyway , I'll prepare some vegetarian food for the barbecue . See you then !
segments.speaker: S1
